mapper.sql: SELECT t1.APPLICATIONID, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPID, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFAPPSETTINGID, t1.WFAPPSETTINGNAME FROM T_SRFWFAPPSETTING t1

SELECT t1.`APPLICATIONID`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`REMINDMSGTEMPID`, t1.`REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFAPPSETTINGID`, t1.`WFAPPSETTINGNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFAPPSETTING` t1
SELECT t1.APPLICATIONID, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPID, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFAPPSETTINGID, t1.WFAPPSETTINGNAME FROM T_WFAPPSETTING t1

SELECT t1.APPLICATIONID AS APPLICATIONID, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPID AS REMINDMSGTEMPID, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME AS REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFAPPSETTINGID AS WFAPPSETTINGID, t1.WFAPPSETTINGNAME AS WFAPPSETTINGNAME FROM T_SRFWFAPPSETTING t1

SELECT t1.APPLICATIONID AS APPLICATIONID, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPID AS REMINDMSGTEMPID, t1.REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME AS REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFAPPSETTINGID AS WFAPPSETTINGID, t1.WFAPPSETTINGNAME AS WFAPPSETTINGNAME FROM T_SRFWFAPPSETTING t1

SELECT t1.[APPLICATIONID], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[REMINDMSGTEMPID], t1.[REMINDMSGTEMPLNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFAPPSETTINGID], t1.[WFAPPSETTINGNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFAPPSETTING] t1
